SEARCH
Module com.example.protrack
Package com.example.protrack.users

Interface IUsersDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UsersDAO
public interface IUsersDAO
Interface for Data Access Object (DAO) that defines methods for interacting with the users database table.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      void createTable()
      Creates the users table in the database if it doesn't exist. This method is responsible for defining the table structure and executing the SQL command to create the table.

    • getAllUsers

      List<AbstractUser> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of AbstractUser objects representing all users in the system.

    • mapResultSetToUser

      AbstractUser mapResultSetToUser(ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException
      Maps a SQL ResultSet to an AbstractUser object. This method is responsible for transforming a database row into a user object.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - The ResultSet containing user data.
      Returns:
      An AbstractUser object populated with the data from the ResultSet.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • deleteUserById

      void deleteUserById(Integer employeeId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a user from the database based on their employee ID.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the operation fails.

    • getManagerialUsers

      List<ManagerialUser> getManagerialUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of users who are categorized as managerial users.
      Returns:
      A list of ManagerialUser objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getWarehouseUsers

      List<WarehouseUser> getWarehouseUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of users who are categorized as warehouse users.
      Returns:
      A list of WarehouseUser objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getProductionUsers

      List<ProductionUser> getProductionUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of users who are categorized as production users.
      Returns:
      A list of ProductionUser objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • dropTable

      void dropTable()
      Drops the users table from the database if it exists. This method is responsible for removing the entire users table and all associated data.

    • getUserById

      AbstractUser getUserById(Integer employeeId)
      Retrieves a user from the database based on their employee ID.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An AbstractUser object representing the user with the specified ID.

    • getEmployeeIdByFullName

      Integer getEmployeeIdByFullName(String fullName) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the employee ID of a user based on their full name.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The full name of the user.
      Returns:
      The employee ID corresponding to the user's full name.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the name does not exist.

    • newUser

      void newUser(AbstractUser user)
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - An AbstractUser object representing the new user to be added.

    • isTableEmpty

      boolean isTableEmpty()
      Checks if the users table in the database is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the table is empty, false otherwise.

    • getMaxEmployeeId

      Integer getMaxEmployeeId() throws SQLException
      Retrieves the maximum employee ID from the users table.
      Returns:
      The highest employee ID in the users table, or null if the table is empty.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
